CrossOriginIsolated.summary:
The global crossOriginIsolated read-only property returns a boolean value that
indicates whether the website is in a cross-origin isolation state. That state mitigates the risk of side-channel attacks and unlocks a few capabilities:

remarks.para: A website is in a cross-origin isolated state, when the response header Cross-Origin-Opener-Policy has the value same-origin and the Cross-Origin-Embedder-Policy header has the value require-corp or credentialless.
